wikipedia_page.main: Charles McCallum (died 10 August 1930) was a Scottish professional footballer who played as a winger. His uncle Neil and his son Denis both played for Celtic.

response: His nephew Charles and great-nephew Denis McCallum were also footballers, the latter playing for Celtic in the 1920s.The Death Of Charles McCallum, Northern Whig, 16 August 1930, via Play Up Liverpool
